rounds.pro_tip: DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with gradual focus falloff. AI images often have abrupt transitions between sharp and blurry areas, or apply blur inconsistently across the frame.

REAL ROBOTS look manufactured — visible seams, consistent materials, machined surfaces. AI-generated robots often have impossible geometry, melting joints, or materials that shift texture mid-surface.
NATURE'S CHAOS: Real landscapes have true randomness — no two leaves or clouds repeat. AI tends to create subtle repetitive patterns in foliage and generates unnaturally smooth water surfaces.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated landscape image as images/d2r3_ai_abstract_landscape.jpg in your repo. Unsplash removes AI images — never rely on them for AI content rounds.

rounds.pro_tip: ORGANIC CHAOS: Real food has imperfect placement, natural shadows, and varying textures. AI food images often look too perfect, with suspiciously uniform colors and unnaturally smooth surfaces.

SCREEN ARTIFACTS: Real photos of screens show moiré patterns, pixel grids, and uneven brightness from the backlight. AI-generated screen images are too clean — perfectly uniform glow with no physical display artifacts.
TEXTURE DEPTH: Real abstract photos maintain consistent texture at all zoom levels. AI-generated abstracts often break down into smudges or show banding artifacts in smooth gradients.
rounds._note: Replaces broken Round 6 image. Pawel Czerwinski is a verified prolific Unsplash contributor with 1000+ photos.

rounds.pro_tip: TEXT AND SIGNAGE: Look for text in the image. AI consistently mangles letters, producing gibberish on signs, storefronts, and license plates. Real photos always have legible text.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated cityscape as images/d2r7_ai_dreamlike_cityscape.jpg. The original Unsplash AI image (Oct 2023) was purged.

rounds.pro_tip: REFLECTION TEST: Real reflections on glossy surfaces have natural distortion and light scatter. AI often makes reflections too perfect or places them at physically impossible angles.

STRUCTURAL LOGIC: Real buildings follow physics — load-bearing walls, consistent window grids, functional doors. AI architecture often has floating elements, impossible cantilevers, and windows that don't align with interior floors.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated building as images/d2r9_ai_surreal_architecture.jpg. The original (Oct 2023) was purged from Unsplash.

rounds.pro_tip: LIGHTING PHYSICS: Real neon casts colored light that spills onto nearby surfaces with natural falloff. AI neon often glows in isolation — bright tubes that don't illuminate their surroundings realistically.
